ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: Peer ID published on chain {{peerId}}
ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips: No Peer ID found on chain. Use the following commands (given that boost init generates a new identity):
ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTipsCommand:
# Get the miner Peer ID
PEER_ID=$(boostd net id)
# Show Peer ID
echo "$PEER_ID"
# Set the Peer ID on chain
lotus-miner actor set-peer-id "$PEER_ID"

ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: Multiaddr published on chain {{multiaddresses}}
ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips:
No Multi address found on chain, publish the correct Multiaddr by following these action items:
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the Multiaddr on chain :

ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.resolveTips:
Format is invalid, publish the correct Multiaddr by following these action items:
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the new Multiaddr on chain :
ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.name: Verifying Multiaddr format

ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.name: Testing miner Peer ID reachability
ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.resolveTips:
Cannot connect to miner.
1. Verify miner libP2P port is publicly reachable.
2. Set the correct Peer ID on chain using the following commands (given that boost init generates a new identity) :
ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.resolveTipsCommand:
# Get the miner Peer ID
PEER_ID=$(boostd net id)
# Show Peer ID
echo "$PEER_ID"
# Set the Peer ID on chain
lotus-miner actor set-peer-id "$PEER_ID"

ERR_CIDGRAVITY_SIDE.resolveTips: An error occurred whilst trying to test the miner connectivity, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

ERR_DEAL_PROTOCOL_UNSUPPORTED.name: Deal protocols supported {{dealProtocolsSupported}}
ERR_DEAL_PROTOCOL_UNSUPPORTED.resolveTips:
Cannot retrieve supported libp2p storage market protocols.
Consider running the last stable version of boost or venus

ERR_NO_MATCHING_DEAL_PROTOCOL_SUPPORTED.name: Verifying deal protocol compatibility
ERR_NO_MATCHING_DEAL_PROTOCOL_SUPPORTED.resolveTips:
Unsupported libp2p market protocol.
Consider running the last stable version of BOOST or VENUS

ERR_CIDGRAVITY_CONNECTOR_MISCONFIGURED.resolveTips:
No response from CIDgravity connector.
Deploy the latest release of CIDgravity
ERR_CIDGRAVITY_CONNECTOR_MISCONFIGURED.name: Verifying CIDgravity connector is deployed and configured
ERR_CIDGRAVITY_CONNECTOR_MISCONFIGURED.resolveTipsCommand:
sudo -i -u "<USER_RUNNING_BOOST_PROCESS>"
git clone https://github.com/CIDgravity/CIDgravity-X.git
cd CIDgravity-X
# Follow the README.md instructions

ERR_TIMEOUT.name: CIDgravity connectivity test service is unavailable.
ERR_TIMEOUT.resolveTips: An error occurred whilst trying to test the miner connectivity, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

ERR_GET_ASK.name: Retrieving miner storage ask
ERR_GET_ASK.resolveTips: Cannot get miner get-ask info. Verify the pricing is set correctly locally:

ERR_GET_ASK_PRICES_NOT_SET_TO_ZERO.resolveTips:
All prices must be set to 0 as pricing management is delegated and managed through CIDgravity.
Set the prices in boost UI [Settings][Storage Ask]

ERR_GET_ASK_SIZES_NOT_PROPERLY_SET.resolveTips:
Piece sizes must be set to 256B and {{getAskSectorSize}} as acceptance criteria are delegated and managed through CIDgravity.
Set the prices in boost UI [Settings][Storage Ask]

ERR_SEND_PROPOSAL.name: Sending test deal proposal
ERR_SEND_PROPOSAL.resolveTips:
Could not established a connection to {{minerID}}({{peerId}}) at {{multiaddresses}}

Verify miner is publicly reachable.
